definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: of foregoing, c.art. = n. coll. Jos 13:5 [[והארץ הַגִּבְלִי]], but rd. ´[[גְבוּל הַגּ]], cf. Di. 1Ki 5:32 [[הַגִּבְלִים]] (but prob. txt. err.; Th rds. [[וַיַּגְבִּלוּם]] and they bordered them, made a border for them (the stones); LXX e)/balon, cf. also Klo).
